title: How is rageblade vayne balanced?
body:
How do i play a tank vs this garbage?
3 item ornn
glad those resistances meant something. vayne wasn't even that fed at the time. maybe 8/5
[](https://imgur.com/8DUjqbb)

How do you honestly expect me to itemize versus this? this is frusterating to even play against, i'm literally as squishy as my carries.

replies.body: 8 seconds thats a long time to survive vayne attacking you

8sec in deathlog doesn't mean that Vayne did hit him for 8 sec, coulld mean someone hit him with a poke or that he brawled another tank and vayne just joined for the last 3 sec. 
Could also mean nothing at all cause deathlog is as shitty as ever...

> [{quoted}](name=Grimspeake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-05T02:36:19.091+0000)
>
> 8 seconds thats a long time to survive vayne attacking you

It was a really, really, really bad Vayne.
Nothing else could be true. Vayne generally shreds you in way less.
OP wrote about running away with flash and E or he´d have lasted for 2 seconds :P

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-04-05T08:33:23.011+0000)
>
> OP wrote about running away with flash and E or he´d have lasted for 2 seconds :P

Yeah, I was taking that into account. :)
2 seconds is like.. 5 attacks for Vayne. 5 shots doing only 4k damage... Hmmm.. Weak Vayne. :p
He was an ornn with 2 upgraded armor items. and 3 armor items altogether.
A certain scent of sarcasm has appeared from the guy,  you ought to take that into consideration x)

^^^
I mean... Not entirely sarcastic but definitely a bit of exaggeration.
Vayne needs addressed but in reality, armor actually does not help.

A few more than Vayne needs to be addressed due to them breaking the logic of the game too much but yeah pretty much, just because a few outliers cause the system to be unreliable one shouldnt really change the system, fix the outliers instead. 

Would be nice if Riot followed Scarra´s thoughts on her <.<

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-07T08:01:14.983+0000)
>
> A few more than Vayne needs to be addressed due to them breaking the logic of the game too much but yeah pretty much, just because a few outliers cause the system to be unreliable one shouldnt really change the system, fix the outliers instead. 
> 
> Would be nice if Riot followed Scarra´s thoughts on her <.<

Of course.
A quick look at the tier lists for the last... Umm.. 5 months? would tell you it is the exact same types of champions except the random up and down ones that Riot buff to absurd levels and then gut.

If you have Randuin's no. Attack speed slow.

I've had a Caitlyn Chase me on Illaoi and literally take 20 shots to kill me with Randuin's.

Caitlyn is not Vayne though.
Caitlyn is a reasonable ADC.
Vayne, not so much. The attack speed slow is the only way to reduce her damage. The rest is irrelevant.

> [{quoted}](name=Grimspeake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-05T02:36:19.091+0000)
>
> 8 seconds thats a long time to survive vayne attacking you

he probably got stunned to a wall or something :/

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3013832759/209095222

* Vayne got that GA at 34:20 and sold the DShield at 37:24, so you had Warmogs, Frozen Fist, Infernal Mask, and Tabi. That means she was an item ahead.
* Vayne was 7/6 before this point, and in that fight she then got a triple. It was a teamfight, and others participated in killing you.
* You lived over 8 seconds. Is that bad? Seems decent. Note that you mitigated a huge portion of her physical autos with a large pool of EH, which played a big part in letting you live more than a couple seconds. That's what tank items are for.
* How long do you think a tank should live in the front line of a teamfight? 10 seconds? 15? 30? Forever? Preventing that is the whole point of Silver Bolts.
* Counterbuilding isn't the same as counterplaying. How do you counterbuild Trist's Q? How do you counterbuild Lucian's passive? Silver Bolts serves as Vayne's steroid, without which she probably wouldn't be a marksman. Your health and armor were effective against the AD and crit that Vayne bought, and partially effective against the AS she bought (which lets her deal more physical damage and get more W applications).
* You are not as squishy as your carries. Your carries hear Zed laugh, and then he pops up in their face just long enough to press QW, and then he's gone again. The carry dies either immediately or in a couple seconds when the ult pops. Of course, if Zed had to linger a while to kill e.g. MF, she would press Q and delete him, which is why his damage has to be so high: everyone's is. N.B.: the Zed in this match was having a tough time, and the MF wasn't going for a one-shot build, but they're basically balanced around doing so.
* Your team won.

TL;DR: Your tank stats allowed you to survive for a pretty long time, and your team won.

P.S.: Delete Phantom Hit.
To be fair, I only lasted 8 seconds because of good flash and e away, or it would have been two seconds. Not ok.

> [{quoted}](name=Awoo ÒwÓ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2019-04-05T07:20:10.169+0000)
>
> To be fair, I only lasted 8 seconds because of good flash and e away, or it would have been two seconds. Not ok.

Why is it not okay? The game is balanced around you playing it, not standing there AFK.

Because as a frontline he isnt really expected to be running away, and if he cant last more than 2-3 seconds as a true frontliner then he is essentially useless.

Which is something Vayne does to pretty much all melee.

A tank basically has to be able to last at least 6-8 seconds while tanking damage for the entire duration, otherwise they arent worth picking at all, and Vayne makes that pretty much impossible.

I mean look at Seju before she was super gutted but after the main nerfs, between her passive, aftershock, stoneplate and sheer tank stats she could almost always last 6-7 seconds at the very least even with a onhit Varus+ardent censer support shooting at her, midlaner and toplaner optional. 

Vayne though? 3-4 seconds later you die regardless of how much health you have from her alone.


Although i figure rageblade was probably stacked from the start.

The W needs nerfs and Rageblade should not work with her W. That interaction removes a part of skill that determined a good vayne from a bad vayne. The % max hp should also be lowered since not long ago, the minimum base damage got upped (it got nerfed after, but the min right now is higher than it was before that buff following a nerf).

Indeed i pretty much agree that W needs at least a small nerf and it should not interact with Rageblade, previously if Vayne really wanted to demolish a tank she´d need botrk and a few attackspeed items, now she gets botrk+rageblade then crit and doesnt really lose much as Rageblade offers armor pen and phantom hits which empowers both the onhit and the crit parts of her build.

Which essentially makes her strong against everything without any real loss.....she needs nerfs to tone her down from this because no one likes playing against a character that is good with and against everything :(

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0006000100000000,timestamp=2019-04-05T08:35:09.203+0000)
>
> Because as a frontline he isnt really expected to be running away, and if he cant last more than 2-3 seconds as a true frontliner then he is essentially useless.
> 
> Which is something Vayne does to pretty much all melee.
> 
> A tank basically has to be able to last at least 8 seconds while tanking damage for the entire duration, otherwise they arent worth picking at all, and Vayne makes that pretty much impossible.
> 
> I mean look at Seju before she was super gutted but after the main nerfs, between her passive, aftershock, stoneplate and sheer tank stats she could almost always last 6-7 seconds at the very least even with a onhit Varus+ardent censer support shooting at her, midlaner and toplaner optional. 
> 
> Vayne though? 3-4 seconds later you die regardless of how much health you have from her alone.
> 
> 
> Although i figure rageblade was probably stacked from the start.

There is a broad spectrum between running away and standing there facetanking everything while you spam laugh. Vayne was created specifically so that tanks couldn't get away with the latter. Fiora does this too, by the way.

Yes, Rageblade's Phantom Hit is the culprit here. It breaks fundamental design assumptions, just like Stormrazor's guaranteed crit did, and is equally deserving of being reworked into a different effect.

What they were created for doesnt really mean squat at this point, it what they are doing that matters.

And that is essentially punishing people for trying to play any kind of frontline at all, not just high resistance or high health ones, max health true damage has no counter short of killing the user. 

Phantom hits is certainly making it worse but thats not what´s making people dislike Fiora, nor was Vayne actually much better from this perspective even without it, she´d just stack up a heap of attackspeed instead of crit and she´d end up less able to kill squishies but still making any kind of frontline feel like they might as well not be there at all. 

I wont ask that she become as bad as say Jhin or as average as Sivir at dealing with a tank but a few more seconds to do the job really should not hurt given that her current build is good with everything....so making it less good would be ideal.

And if we are going there then crit itself is a broken stat.....it´s supposed to be a sort of RNG damage boost but its being used as the item core for DPS builds and and crit itself works on a formula that basically says that "You have X crit chance and you gain X crit chance as bonus for your next auto if you dont crit"....which is not RNG at all.
You counterbuild Lucian's passive with {{item:3075}}

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-04-05T05:26:26.654+0000)
>
> You counterbuild Lucian's passive with {{item:3075}}

He'll get the same percent DPS increase from his passive no matter what you build.
I meant since he gets the double on-hit proc from his passive, he takes double damage from Thornmail that attack.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-05T09:00:45.061+0000)
>
> I meant since he gets the double on-hit proc from his passive, he takes double damage from Thornmail that attack.

And Vayne generally builds more AS than Lucian, meaning more Thornmail procs, so it counters her, too. And it also counters Trist's Q. But it doesn't counter Jhin, because he attacks slowly.

Right?

Well Vayne it actually does counter, because attack speed slows are the only counter to her W (aside from healing and shielding).
Was just pointing out an item that had a beneficial impact against Lucian passive.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=000600000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-05T21:08:59.451+0000)
>
> Well Vayne it actually does counter, because attack speed slows are the only counter to her W (aside from healing and shielding).
> Was just pointing out an item that had a beneficial impact against Lucian passive.

AS slows do indeed decrease her W DPS, but whenever I bring that up the instant retort is that Rageblade allows her to auto, Tumble for a reset, and get W to three stacks with just those two hits. And Riot is trying to delete her Tumble CD or something these days.

Its almost like vayne is supposed to be good against tanks and bruisers!

Shes bad against mages, or anything higher range than her, play a mage if you want to shit on vayne (or an assassin that can 1 shot her before she autos more than once).

> [{quoted}](name=Anime Fizz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2019-04-05T11:48:02.876+0000)
>
> Its almost like vayne is supposed to be good against tanks and bruisers!

"its her identity" is a circular argument. youre trying to justify vaynes mechanics by their own existence, instead of trying to find a reason why a champion should have this kind of identity and why it should exist in the game.

shes not just good against tanks and bruisers.

shes hyperspecialized against them to the point that shes unfair to play against for them, and should at the very least never be viable outside her specific niche as a result.

but since that would result in her almost never seeing play, and she evidently sells a lot of skins when shes played, riot overbuffed her to the point that shes a viable (even strong) pick outside her specific niche, but still hyperspecialized to just automatically win against slow melee bruisers, and a lot of tanks.

she needs counterplay. this is really the problem with her. her core design is just broken. not even the fact that she has the % health true damage in her kit, but how there is literally no way to play around it, and the best you can do outpick her and beat her in champ select like proven by your own post. your whole argement is "but pick x into her" and not "you play this or that way against her when youre a bruiser or tank".

Did you know that she is one of the most mobile adcs in the game? Doesnt mobility counter mages? Yes it does
She also has stealth to anullate her short range, reposition and 3shot you. She has no real counterplay. Thats her issue.
Like when Yasuo comes mid. He has no counterplay mid, no resource, outdamages, outpushes and outsustains everyone.
In top its different he takes skill, mid is free lane for him every time.
Same with ranged tops. No ranged champion should be allowed to play top EVER.
Its not fair to win lane by picking range advantage. It should never be a thing.
Minions should be changed so they dont give the XP to unmatching class of champion until 9 minutes into the game.
So what im saying is that if you pick Vayne top you should get 25% gold and 25% Xp until 9 minutes to kill the ranged top thing. No more Viktors, Cassios and other stuff top.
Same with Sion mid or anything like that. Kill the strat.
Same with mages and bruisers bot. 25%gold 25% Xp kill the strat
So the champs will be balanced to belong to 1 or 2 lanes max
Will be closer to 50% in their own lane because they woulnt have to consider other lanes for that particular champion.
=more balance=less complaining= more fun
That...is an absolute terrible idea.
Well simple. Its not balanced.

Agreed,
A Vayne on the enemy team makes a frontline useless as soon as she has her first item if it's a rageblade, whenever I plan on playing a tank and I'm one of the first picks I have to ban Vayne because of this and if I'm one of the last picks and was planning on playing a tank but see a vayne on the enemy team I just choose something to build pretty much full damage with because you'll pop like a baloon as a tank anyway if the rageblade Vayne isn't completely terrible at positioning.

Having a Vayne counter tanks has been the case for long and I guess that's normal but currently it's on a whole other unhealthy level.
As a tank support you can't even go for minions with the support item anymore cuz she'll chase you to death in a matter of 2-3 passive procs when she has the rageblade, which doesn't take long at all and no longer has the counterplay of not giving her to chance to get the 3rd shot off.

So yeah, I hope the balance team does something about this.

> [{quoted}](name=feed to victory,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-05T01:34:00.135+0000)
>
> Agreed,
> A Vayne on the enemy team makes a frontline useless as soon as she has her first item if it's a rageblade, whenever I plan on playing a tank and I'm one of the first picks I have to ban Vayne because of this and if I'm one of the last picks and was planning on playing a tank but see a vayne on the enemy team I just choose something to build pretty much full damage with because you'll pop like a baloon as a tank anyway if the rageblade Vayne isn't completely terrible at positioning.
> 
> Having a Vayne counter tanks has been the case for long and I guess that's normal but currently it's on a whole other unhealthy level.
> As a tank support you can't even go for minions with the support item anymore cuz she'll chase you to death in a matter of 2-3 passive procs when she has the rageblade, which doesn't take long at all and no longer has the counterplay of not giving her to chance to get the 3rd shot off.
> 
> So yeah, I hope the balance team does something about this.

I like how Riot hates champs like {{champion:48}} countering tanks with his ult, but it's somehow okay for Vayne to do it just by auto-attacking. She can also burst down squishy targets, which he cannot.

How is Vayne balanced? That is the better question. %Max hp true damage is impossible to balance, let alone on a ranged champion with her level of self-peel. She gets out of hand just about every season, often because Riot gives her unneeded buffs.

You survived 8 seconds and are complaining that an ANTI TANK MARKSMAN killed you?

My god boards these days.


Yi would kill you in less than half that.

I mean shes almost full items in the picture. Plus she needs 6 hits to proc phantom hit. If youre playing Ornn you should simply cc lock her while an ally beats her up. If youre trying to solo her as an Ornn well thats your bad.

Implying that any other ADC wouldn't have killed you in 8 seconds of free attacking at 5 items. She also still deals a ton of physical damage, which you can reduce. From this death recap it just looks like you have 4k health and no armor items whatsoever. The effect without icon above her auto attacks is Botrk damage which only further implies that you only had a ton of health.
https://i.imgur.com/y8kSR4b.png[/img]

(How do i play a tank vs this garbage?)

you are not supposed to tank an anti tank champion in the first place (i know rageblade vayne is op , but a tank will suffer from vayne no matter her build)

First, Death Recap isn't that reliable of a system (I've had times where I've checked it and it said that someone that's not even in the game contributed to the kill via their {{item:3087}} or something) to use to gauge things like this with.

Next, Riot knows, and Riot doesn't care. I'll give them that Vayne IS by design a Tank-Melter ADC, but the fact that the Rageblade allows her to bypass the 3rd hit required for her Silver Bolts to proc, allowing her to do it faster, and melt you faster is ridiculous. And the supposed counter to true damage is to build health. But wait, what's that now? She does %HP TRUE DAMAGE, so even building the so-called counter to true damage doesn't work! Then Build Armor! But that doesn't work BECAUSE of her True damage!

So you literally CAN'T ITEMIZE against her.

I find that quote from Scarra is more and more true the more I think about Vayne: "Whenever vayne is meta, riot's balance team has to take note of that because vayne should never be a meta champion..."

> [{quoted}](name=EbonyBladeJ88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-04-05T01:39:01.729+0000)
>
> I'll give them that Vayne IS by design a Tank-Melter ADC

i question this entire design concept.

you cant just make a major portion of the identity of **multiple champion classes** to be durable and load a shitton of their power budget into defense in their kits, and then make a champion who just invalidates all that without any form of mechanical or strategic counterplay while justifying this with "thats her identity". its just straight up unfair design.

thats like introducing a champion into the game who just disables auto attack range and has the ability to passively turn a ranged champion into a melee champion, and then justifying this with "oh well, your entire champion relies on the fact that hes ranged, but that just this guys identity to shit on you without counterplay".

the big problem is, that there is really absolutely no way to play around her w. at least fiora has her vitals and gives you a chance to outposition her and evade the extra damage when you play the fight well. this is entirely impossible with vayne.

you cant possibly play around a 3 hit passive on a ranged champion who attacks more than 5 times in 2 seconds (2.5 as cap + q reset), and decreases this to a 2 hit passive with rageblade, and even further has the potential to break the attack speed cap with lethal tempo.

"if you get into his range, you probably die" is an argument for slowass melee champion like nasus, and not a ranged champion with mobility.

> [{quoted}](name=EbonyBladeJ88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-04-05T01:39:01.729+0000)
>
> First, Death Recap isn't that reliable of a system (I've had times where I've checked it and it said that someone that's not even in the game contributed to the kill via their {{item:3087}} or something) to use to gauge things like this with.
> 
> Next, Riot knows, and Riot doesn't care. I'll give them that Vayne IS by design a Tank-Melter ADC, but the fact that the Rageblade allows her to bypass the 3rd hit required for her Silver Bolts to proc, allowing her to do it faster, and melt you faster is ridiculous. And the supposed counter to true damage is to build health. But wait, what's that now? She does %HP TRUE DAMAGE, so even building the so-called counter to true damage doesn't work! Then Build Armor! But that doesn't work BECAUSE of her True damage!
> 
> So you literally CAN'T ITEMIZE against her.
> 
> I find that quote from Scarra is more and more true the more I think about Vayne: "Whenever vayne is meta, riot's balance team has to take note of that because vayne should never be a meta champion..."

Armor still works vs the rest of her damage.

Silver Bolts is about 25% of her total damage.

Tumble, Blade of the Ruined King, Autos are all physical and make up the other ~75%
Is this the Ornn game where you had ~3k HP and none of the items a smart person buys against a Vayne? (Frozen Heart/Randuin's Omen/Thornmail)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jzz7vI1e,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2019-04-07T08:10:45.053+0000)
>
> Is this the Ornn game where you had ~3k HP and none of the items a smart person buys against a Vayne? (Frozen Heart/Randuin's Omen/Thornmail)

Notice he's also complaining about him having 3 items and dying to a Vayne with 5.
This guy is Mid-to-High Gold with a negative win rate. I think that's more worthwhile complaining about than him dying to a Vayne in a game that he's single-handedly losing.

The thing is because of this now, it is up to the carries to kill Vayne before the frontline crashes.
But how are we supposed to even SEE her to kill her at this point?

The problem isn't Rageblade.

Vayne would be destroy everything without rageblade (as she has done in the past whenever riot overbuffs her) her problem is she is a stat check champion and Riot has buffed her to the point where if she doesn't feed she wins.

Rageblade is BS on her but it isn't why she is OP.
Ironically even if she feeds she can still shred you.
